actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform.

actions.subcommittee: the Civil Service and Agency Organization
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on the Civil Service and Agency Organization.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Civil Service and Agency Organization

official_title: To provide that Federal reserve banks and the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System be covered under chapter 71 of title 5, United States Code, relating to labor-management relations.
short_title: Federal Reserve Labor-Management Relations Accountability Act

summary.text: Federal Reserve Labor-Management Relations Accountability Act - Amends Federal law relating to Government Employees and Labor-Management relations to cover Federal reserve banks and the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System.

titles.title: Federal Reserve Labor-Management Relations Accountability Act
To provide that Federal reserve banks and the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System be covered under chapter 71 of title 5, United States Code, relating to labor-management relations.
